name: Half-Life 3 (itch)
description:
Half-Life 3 is a story about Pudge that is an alien from planet Kleiner. He accidentally activate a portal from his home planet and now are stuck on Earth. Let's help him find his way back to his home planet by traveling all continents of Earth through portals!

Fact Sheet

Game Title: Half-Life 3
Genre: Platformer
Target Audience: 13+ Years Old
Platform: PC
